channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rob Reiner’s son, Nick Reiner, faces 1st-degree murder charges: DA
item.description: Nick Reiner is accused of killing his parents, renowned director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele Singer.

item.title: How did Jeffrey Epstein make all of his money?
item.description: Newly released documents are renewing interest in how Jeffrey Epstein amassed his fortune. Here's how he made his money.

item.title: Brown mourns the loss of an aspiring doctor and campus leader to the campus attack

item.description: The second of two doctors who were convicted in connection with Matthew Perry's ketamine death was sentenced on Tuesday.
